lexUnit.name: howl.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a long doleful cry uttered by an animal such as a dog.

sentence.text: From under the hunched shoulders and clutching arms a broken voice emerged in a stammering howl a stray dog might have launched into the night after company in its loneliness .
The dog had awakened him at ten to seven with long-drawn howls and now , a quarter of an hour later , he stood on the threshold of Sheila 's bedroom , glowering .
As his head collided with the leg of the table he let out a pitiful howl and Isoud , on impulse , pressed the Pause button .
The chanting had taken on the form of animal howls and disgusting collections of words screamed out by the blood-frenzied mob .
Another chilling howl and I could have sworn I smelt their hot , sour breath .
I thought he probably set up a stronger howl than Byron 's dogs !
When they heard it the sepoys threw back their heads and uttered a howl so piercing , so harrowing that every window in the Residency must have dissolved if they had not been already broken .
He felt triumphant and at peace , standing alone with the world spread out at his feet , hearing only the faint howl of the wind and the thunder of his own blood .
As he opened the throttle , the roar of the BMW 's engine bit into the moan and howl of the wind across the culvert 's mouth .
The banshee 's lamentations are in a language no-one can understand , and her cry is an appalling blend of a wild goose 's screech , the screams of an abandoned child and the howl of a wolf .
When the lonely howl of a wolf carried to them through the forest , Isabel jumped , glancing at the door as if she expected to see the beast standing there .
Panting , Theda groped her way through the thick undergrowth , her direction signalled by Benedict crashing through ahead of her , and the howls of the dog growing ever louder .
In the distance , there was the low mournful howl of sirens .
Put down my pen and I heard in my ears the howl of the fleeing dog , saw the metal flash of Sophie 's shoe -- I could not bear it .
But then , with a final burst of rain and a final howl of the gale , it is all over -- the only cyclonic visitation of the year , perhaps .
One bomber -- reportedly a Ju88 -- was seen to be hit by A.A. and went vertically into the sea with a great howl of engines .

Now , as the cries of the spectators rose to a crescendo , they were joined by the familiar stomach-turning howl of the charging sepoys , which added an undertow of dread to the Collector 's pleasure .
She spread her towel over a cushion so that she could lean her damp , aching head against it , then shivered as she listened to the howl of the wind outside .
The porter looked at him drunkenly , then beard the low , mournful howl of the dogs and quickly pushed the bolts home .
And the long-dead wind of Mars erupted in a howl of powered transport .
From far off where the Zoo lay the howl of a lone wolf wound up into the night .
The room rocked with the howls of babies now being put to the breast , stilled .
The wind had increased in velocity and was now a low , angry howl .
They had not gone far when again the clerk heard that long , moaning howl .
Then , after a pause , she broke into a howl .
There were dog howls , wind howls and ice creaks .
The barking ended on a sudden , very loud howl .
It uttered a doglike howl , then raced past Tallis , moving so fast on its hind legs , bent forward , that she could hardly follow its motion .
Sometimes thought to be the souls of unbaptised children and unrepentant sinners , their bloodcurdling howls were an omen of death to all who heard them .
Before he could stop himself , a piercing howl was forced through his teeth .
On 15th June 1877 , a scout 's coyote howl alerted the Nez Perce camp in White Bird Canyon to Perry 's approach .
Unfortunately , because he had had a source of comfort , the moment Ellie left to go back to the house his mournful howls increased in volume .
` For as little as a copper coin , I will utter a howl guaranteed to wake the dead . "
Gilbert tried to scream , but his mouth was clamped shut by Rohmer 's grip and only a ululating , muffled howl vibrated from his throat .
